Kentik | San Francisco, CA | Multiple positions | ONSITE preferred, REMOTE considered

http://kentik.com https://www.kentik.com/careers/

Kentik is network operators, software engineers, and data scientists building the tools we always wanted (but couldn't find) when we ran some of the world's largest networks. Our SaaS platform helps ISPs, hosting providers, and online enterprises like Box, Yelp, Neustar, and OpenDNS understand the traffic on their networks and detect problems fast.

Currently hiring in frontend, backend, operations, sales & solutions engineering.
